unit.name: Dread Prince
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Heavy Armour, Deadly Riposte, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Beastmaster
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Willbreakers Craft, Cannot be Stomped, Heavy Armour, Krakens Hide, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Silexian Officer
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Academy Training, Tactician, Heavy Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Temple Exarch
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Professional Courtesy, Wizard Apprentice, Aegis (4+, against Melee Attacks), Heavy Armour, Battle Focus, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Warlock Outcast
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Irresistible Will, Not a Leader, Wizard Adept, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Silent Assassin
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Not a Leader, Professional Courtesy, Strike from the Shadows, Artistry of Death, Lightning Reflexes, Multiple Wounds (2, against Characters), Poison Attacks, Paired Weapons, Repeater Handbow [3] (2+)

unit.name: Silexian Spears
unit.description: 15-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Academy Training, Scoring, Light Armour, Shield, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Spear

unit.name: Temple Militants
unit.description: 15-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Fearless, Frenzy, Scoring, Light Armour, Battle Focus, Fight in Extra Rank, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Blades of Darag

unit.name: Raiding Party
unit.description: 10-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Hunting Bolas, Light Troops, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Silexian Auxiliaries
unit.description: 15-25 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Academy Training, Scoring, Suppressing Volley, Light Armour, Shield, Lightning Reflexes, March and Shoot, Ruthless Efficiency, Repeater Crossbow (3+)

unit.name: Shadow Riders (Core)
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Hunting Bolas, Light Troops, Vanguard, Light Armour, Shield, Shadow Rider: Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Light Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Shadow Riders
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Hunting Bolas, Light Troops, Vanguard, Light Armour, Shield, Shadow Rider: Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Light Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Warlock Acolytes
unit.description: 5-12 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Light Troops, Wizard Conclave, Aegis (4+, against Melee Attacks), Aegis (5+), Warding Amulet, Light Armour, Acolyte: Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Blades of Darag, Elven Horse: Harnessed

equipment.name: Curse of the Phantom Queen (Hereditary Spell)

unit.name: Dread Knights
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scent of Blood, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield, Dread Knight: Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Plains Raptor: Harnessed, Lethal Strike

unit.name: Obsidian Guard
unit.description: 10-25 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Academy Training, Scoring, Will of the Senate, Heavy Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Halberd

unit.name: Judicators
unit.description: 10-30 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Artistry of Death, Hatred, Lightning Reflexes, Great Weapon

unit.name: Harpies
unit.description: 8-12 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 20x20 mm, Fly (10", 18"), Insignificant, Light Troops, Scent of Blood, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Devastating Charge (+1 Att)

unit.name: Gorgons
unit.description: 1-3 models, 0-2 Units/Army, 0-3 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Fear, Fearless, Strider, Supernal, Aegis (5+), Lightning Reflexes, Petrifying Stare, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Thunder Pack
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 40x60 mm, Light Troops, Scent of Blood, Light Armour, Thunder Beast: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP, Terror), Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3+1), Lashmaster (2): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Raptor Chariot
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Scent of Blood, Swiftstride, Heavy Armour, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Daeb Raptor (2): Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Divine Altar
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Frenzy, Towering Presence, Aegis (5+), Battle Focus, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Black Cloaks
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-3 Units/Army, 0-20 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Hunting Bolas, Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Poison Attacks, Ruthless Efficiency, Paired Weapons, Repeater Handbow [2] (3+)

unit.name: Hunting Chariot
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Hunting Bolas, Swiftstride, Light Armour, Crew (2): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Light Lance, Elven Horse (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate, Imperious Dragonsbane Harpoon (3+)

unit.name: Repeater Battery
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 60 mm round, War Machine, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency, Daeb Bolt Thrower (3+)

unit.name: Kraken
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Coastal Predator, Distracting, Hard Target (1), Kraken: Harnessed, Hatred (against Large, Gigantic), Multiple Wounds (D3), Lashmaster (2): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Hydra
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Cut one off, Fortitude (5+), Hydra: Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 2), Harnessed, Poison Attacks, Rage, Lashmaster (2): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

unit.name: Mist Leviathan
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x100 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Under the Cover of Mists, Distracting, Mist Leviathan: Harnessed, Lashmaster (4): Lightning Reflexes, Ruthless Efficiency

mount.name: Daeb Raptor
Plains Raptor
mount.description: Standard, Cavalry, 25x50 mm, Scent of Blood, Harnessed, Lethal Strike

mount.name: Blackmane Pegasus
mount.description: Large, Cavalry, 40x40 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Harnessed

mount.name: Raptor Chariot
mount.description: Large, Construct, 50x100 mm, Scent of Blood, Swiftstride, Daeb Raptor (2): Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

mount.name: Manticore
mount.description: Fear, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Scent of Blood, Towering Presence, Harnessed, Lethal Strike

mount.name: Imperious Dragon
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts per Army, Gigantic, Beast 50x100 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Meeting of Minds, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed

mount.name: Divine Altar
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts per Army, Large, Construct 60x100 mm, Fear, Towering Presence, War Platform, Divine Blessings, Disciple (3): Lightning Reflexes, Killer Instinct, Poison Attacks, Avatar: Harnessed, Chassis: Inanimate, Impact Hits (D6+1)

item.name: Academy Training
item.description: Units with more than half of their models with Academy Training are considered Academy Trained. While within 8" of one or more other non-Fleeing, friendly Academy Trained units, Academy Trained units: - Gain Devastating Charge (+1" Adv) when declaring their first Charge in any Charge Phase. The effect lasts until the end of the Charge Phase. Characters without Academy Training that Charge out of the unit are not affected. - Count as having one additional Full Rank for the purpose of Steadfast and Disrupted if they have at least one Full Rank

item.name: Hunting Bolas
item.description: The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units that Break from Combat while in base contact with one or more models with Hunting Bolas is subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Professional Courtesy
item.description: The model cannot join units that contain another model from the same unit entry

item.name: Scent of Blood
item.description: The model gains Fearless and Frenzy while Engaged in Combat. In addition, when declaring a Charge against a unit with at least one Health Pool that contains fewer Health Points than it did when the unit was deployed or otherwise entered the Battlefield, the model gains Devastating Charge (+1" Adv), until declaring a new Charge with its unit.

item.name: Artistry of Death
item.description: Close Combat The attack gains +1 to wound.

item.name: Ruthless Efficiency
item.description: Close Combat The attack gains +1 to wound during the First Round of Combat.

item.name: Krakens Hide
item.description: Armour Equipment If on foot, the wearer gains +1 Armour.

item.name: Repeater Crossbow
Repeater Crossbow (3+)
Repeater Crossbow (4+)
Repeater Crossbow (5+)
Repeater Crossbow (2+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 2, Str 3, AP 0. When shooting from Short Range, the weapon gains +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Repeater Handbow
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 12", Shots X, Str 3, AP 0, Accurate, Quick to Fire. When shooting from Short Range, the weapon gains +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Blades of Darag
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Two-Handed. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +1 Attack Value, and attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks. For each non-Attribute Spell with duration One Turn targeting at least one model in the wielders unit, attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, up to a maximum of +2, for as long as the spells effects are applied. This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments.

item.name: Crippling Frost
item.description: Enchantment: Great Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and become Magical Attacks. In addition, for every hit inflicted with the weapon in a Duel, choose a model part of the enemy model. The chosen model part suffers −1 Attack Value until the end of the Duel.

item.name: Lacerating Touch
item.description: Enchantment: Paired Weapons. Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks and gain +2 Armour Penetration. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and Fear.

item.name: Transcendence
item.description: Enchantment: Lance. Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks. For each unsaved wound inflicted against enemy models with this weapon, the wielder gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration for the rest of the game, up to a maximum of +2 each.

item.name: Mastery of Slaughter
item.description: Enchantment: Spear. While using this weapon, the wielder must reroll natural to-wound rolls of 1 with Close Combat Attacks, and attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks. In addition, for each Health Point lost by an enemy unit due to attacks made with this weapon, the wielders side adds +1 to their Combat Score of this Round of Combat. This may exceed the normal limit in Duels.

item.name: Pride of Gar Daecos
item.description: Enchantment: Halberd. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +1 Attack Value, and attacks made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Seal of the Republic
item.description: Models on foot only. Enchantment: Heavy Armour. For each unsaved wound inflicted against enemy models with the wearers Close Combat Attacks, the wearer gains +1 Armour for the rest of the game.

item.name: Caedhrens Pennon
item.description: Infantry models in the bearers unit gain Scent of Blood and Swiftstride.

item.name: Executioners Icon
item.description: The bearer and R&F model parts with Ruthless Efficiency in the bearers unit gain Artistry of Death and lose Ruthless Efficiency.

item.name: Eye of the Gorgon
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count toward Core. The bearer gains Petrifying Stare (see Gorgons unit). Enemy units in base contact with the bearer must reroll successful Discipline Tests.

item.name: Moithirs Mirror
item.description: For each successful Aegis Save roll of 5+ made by the bearer, the bearer immediately inflicts 1 hit with Strength 5, Armour Penetration 2, and Magical Attacks against the model that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the models Health Pool. This is considered a Special Attack. In addition, the bearer gains Aegis (5+).

item.name: Mask of the War Crow
item.description: The bearers unit gains Fear. In addition, the bearer and any friendly unit that contains one or more models with Fear within 6" of the bearers unit must reroll natural to-wound rolls of 1 with its Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Ceinrans Gambit
item.description: Wizards only. The bearer can cast The Wheel Turns (Witchcraft) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Ring of the Obsidian Thrones
item.description: The bearer gains Will of the Senate (see Obsidian Guard unit).

item.name: Beastmasters Whistle
item.description: Beastmasters only. One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Charge Phase. Charge Range rolls of friendly Manticores and models with Type Beast within 12" of the bearer are subject to Maximised Roll until the end of the Charge Phase.

item.name: Deadly Riposte
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. For each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural 1 is rolled to hit, the Dread Prince must perform a Close Combat Attack at the same Initiative Step that must be allocated towards the model (or Health Pool) that rolled the 1 to hit. If this is not possible, ignore the effect.

item.name: Willbreakers Craft
item.description: Universal Rule. Discipline Tests taken by friendly non-Construct models with Towering Presence within 12" of one or more models with Willbreakers Craft are subject to Minimised Roll. If within 12" of one or more models with Willbreakers Craft, the roll for determining the number of hits from Stomp Attacks of: - Friendly models is subject to Maximised Roll. - Enemy models is subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Battle Oracle
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Wizard Adept, loses Wizard Apprentice, and must select spells from Divination. The bearer and models using Blades of Darag in the bearers unit gain Distracting.

item.name: War Smith
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Wizard Adept, loses Wizard Apprentice, and must select spells from Alchemy. Models with Armour 4 or more in enemy units in base contact with the model must reroll successful Armour Saves against wounds caused by Blades of Darag.

item.name: Irresistible Will
item.description: Universal Rule. The Casting Values of spells cast by the model are increased by +1. Dispelling rolls against spells cast by the model suffer a −2 modifier.

item.name: Strike from the Shadows
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot be deployed during the Deployment Phase. Instead, at the start of any Player Turn, the owner may choose an unengaged friendly Standard Infantry unit that is not Fleeing and apply the following rules: - Remove a non-Champion R&F model from the chosen unit and deploy the Silent Assassin inside that unit. - You cannot remove the last R&F model from a unit, and removing the model never causes a Panic Test. - The Silent Assassin cannot voluntarily leave its unit during the Player Turn in which it was deployed. - If the model is not deployed by the end of Game Turn 4, it counts as a casualty and cannot be deployed for the rest of the game.

item.name: Extraordinary Specimen
item.description: Universal Rule. The Manticore gains Stomp Attacks (D3), its Resilience is set to 5, and its base size is changed to 50x100 mm.

item.name: Meeting of Minds
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Scent of Blood and treats all friendly Beast models as Insignificant.

item.name: Beast Breaker
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Cannot be Stomped and Shield. At the start of each friendly Player Turn, for each unit that contains one or more models with Beast Breaker, choose another friendly unit within 8" of that unit. Model parts with Harnessed in the chosen units gain Devastating Charge (Hatred) until the end of the next Player Turn.

item.name: Corsair
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Krakens Hide, and Paired Weapons. In addition, each Charging unit with one or more models with Corsair adds +1 to its sides Combat Score if fighting an enemy unit in the enemys Flank or Rear.

item.name: Suppressing Volley
item.description: Universal Rule. At the start of each friendly Charge Phase, each unengaged non-Shaken friendly Silexian Auxiliaries unit with at least one Full Rank may nominate a single unengaged enemy unit within 18" and within Line of Sight. If so, the Silexian Auxiliaries unit cannot declare any Charges during this Charge Phase. Until the end of the Player Turn, the nominated enemy unit suffers -1 to-hit against Charging Academy Trained units. Nominating a unit from more than one Silexian Auxiliaries unit has no stacking effect.

item.name: Warding Amulet
item.description: Personal Protection. The bearer gains Aegis (+1, max. 3+) for each non- Attribute Spell with duration One Turn targeting at least one model in the bearers unit for as long as the spells effects are applied.

item.name: Will of the Senate
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units within 6" of a non-Fleeing unit containing one or more models with Will of the Senate must reroll failed Panic Tests.

item.name: Petrifying Stare
item.description: Special Attack. At Initiative Step 10, each enemy unit in base contact with the model suffers 2 hits with Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks that wound on: - 4+ for models of Standard Height - 5+ for models of Large Height - 6+ for models of Gigantic Height

item.name: Crucible of Slaughter
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Not a Leader and War Platform. In addition, during the Melee Phase, the models unit and enemy units in base contact with the models unit suffer -1 Resilience. Models with Crucible of Slaughter are not affected. While part of an Infantry unit, Attendants gain the same Close Combat Weapons as the R&F models in the unit. They can use Spears despite not being Infantry.

item.name: Effigy of Dread
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Channel (3), Fear, Fearless, Unbreakable, Blades of Darag, and its Health Points are set to 6. The model cannot declare any Charges nor perform Pursuit Moves, and its Advance Rate and March Rate are always 0", i.e. the model cannot perform any Advance Moves, March Moves, Magical Moves, nor Random Movement. In addition, friendly units within 18" of the model gain Fear. Enemy units within 18" of the model cannot benefit from Rally Around the Flag for Fear Tests. At the end of each friendly Magic Phase, the owner may discard up to 2 Veil Tokens from their Veil Token pool to increase the range of Effigy of Dread by +3" for each discarded Veil Token. The effect lasts until the start of the next friendly Magic Phase.

item.name: Dragonsbane Harpoon
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 7, AP 4, Multiple Wounds (2), Quick to Fire, Reload!.

item.name: Daeb Bolt Thrower
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2. Note that the model can move and shoot.

item.name: Coastal Predator
item.description: Universal Rule. While the centre of the models base is inside a Water Terrain Feature, the model gains Devastating Charge (+2" Adv) and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Cut one off
item.description: Universal Rule. For each successful Fortitude Save roll of a natural 6, the model disregards another simultaneously suffered wound. If there arent enough simultaneously suffered wounds to disregard, the model immediately Recovers 1 Health Point instead.

item.name: Rage
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. Whenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it gains a Health Point, it suffers −1 Attack Value.

item.name: Under the Cover of Mists
item.description: Universal Rule. When determining Deployment Zones, in case of a tie, the player whose army contains one or more Mist Leviathans may decide which player chooses their Deployment Zone instead of rolling again. Roll again if both armies contain one or more Mist Leviathans. In addition, at the start of the owners first Player Turn, friendly Infantry units within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans may choose to set their March Rate to 14". If so, they lose March and Shoot. The effects last until the end of the Player Turn. When calculating Combat Scores, the Combat Score bonus of friendly Charging models within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathan is +2 instead of +1.

item.name: Colossal Kraken
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +2 Health Points, 2 additional Lashmasters, and its base size is changed to 100x150 mm.

item.name: Seal of the 9th Fleet
item.description: Silexian Officers only. Models with Academy Training in the bearers unit gain Battle Focus in the First Round of Combat.

item.name: Tactician
item.description: Universal Rule. The range of Academy Training to and from the bearers unit is increased from 8" to 12".

item.name: Corsair and Repeater Handbow (2) (4+)
item.description: - Corsair: Universal Rule. The model gains Krakens Hide, and Paired Weapons. In addition, each Charging unit with one or more models with Corsair adds +1 to its sides Combat Score if fighting an enemy unit in the enemys Flank or Rear. - Repeater Handbow: Shooting Weapon. Range 12", Shots X, Str 3, AP 0, Accurate, Quick to Fire. When shooting from Short Range, the weapon gains +1 Armour Penetration.
